summary: A young boy dreams that he is in an imaginary world where, assisted by his family's plumber, he must save other piano-playing kids like himself from the dungeons of his dictatorial piano teacher who also mind-controls his mother.
cast: Peter Lind Hayes|Mary Healy|Hans Conried|Tommy Rettig|Jack Heasley|Robert Heasley|Noel Cravat|George Chakiris|Alan Aric|Tony Butala|Kim Charney|Luigi Faccuito|Henry Kulky|Diki Lerner|Harry Wilson
title: Cinco mil dedos del Dr. T
